description:
All-mountain hard shell pants with waterproof-breathable versatility for experience-hungry skiers and climbers. Breathable Gore-Tex C-Knit® technology makes these the choice for backcountry days that might serve up sleet delivered on a bed of Arctic wind. A minimalist design keeps the weight down so you can move fast and perhaps outpace the worst of the weather.

  • Made of supple 3L GORE-TEX® C-Knit fabric that offers excellent breathability and protection in harsh mountain environments
  • Seams are taped and fully waterproof
  • Cut high in the waist to overlap with jackets and provide good coverage
  • Integrated adjustable waistband with snap closure
  • Full-length side zips with double sliders for venting and easy access over boots
  • Articulated knees and gusseted crotch for a full range of motion
  • Reinforced polyester and Kevlar kick patches resist abrasion
  • Snap adjustable cuffs have a boot lace hook and grommets for adding tie-down options
  • Recco® Rescue System reflector is detectable by ski patrol and rescue teams. Useful for resort skiing, it is not a substitute for skills training, beacons, or smart decision-making in the backcountry
name: MEC Synergy Gore-Tex Alpine Pants - Men's
